text: Ni bu zhidao ma? An la cong tianshang jiangxia yushui, ranhou shi ta shenru di li, chengwei quanshui; ranhou, jie ta shengchu ge zhong zhuangjia, ranhou hemiao diaoling, ni kan ta bian cheng huang de, ranhou ta shi ta bian cheng suipian. Zai na limian, duiyu you lizhi zhe, dique youyi zhong jiaohui
